content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a jungle_boat, I first need to craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks can be crafted from jungle_log, and therefore I will move the jungle_log to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Since I have crafted the jungle_planks, I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft another jungle_planks to craft the jungle_boat, and therefore I will move the remaining jungle_log to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
